field.name: component
field.label: Select Component
field.description: Select which component's comment to display

field.name: category
field.label: Filter by Category ID
field.description: Filter comments with category id (comma separated)

field.name: random
field.label: Randomized
field.description: If enabled, module will fetch random comments

field.name: filtersticked
field.label: Sticked comments only
field.description: If enabled, module will only fetch sticked comments

field.name: showtitle
field.label: Show blog title
field.description: Show or hide the blog's title text in the module.

field.name: showcomponent
field.label: Show component title
field.description: Show or hide the component's title text in the module.

field.name: showavatar
field.label: Show avatar
field.description: Show or hide the commentor's avatar in the module.

field.name: showauthor
field.label: Show author
field.description: Show or hide the author's name in the module.

field.name: maxcommentlength
field.label: Max comment length
field.description: Specify the length of characters display in comments text.

field.name: maxtitlelength
field.label: Max title length
field.description: Specify the length of characters display in title text.
